field.label: Course Description
field.value: A project-based course dealing with the design and implementation of behavior-based robots to accomplish specific tasks. Students work in groups and are introduced to concepts in vision, image processing, feedback control, signal processing and robotics.

bilingual.english: A project-based course dealing with the design and implementation of behavior-based robots to accomplish specific tasks. Students work in groups and are introduced to concepts in vision, image processing, feedback control, signal processing and robotics.

field.label: Course Description
field.value: In this course you will learn about prediction problems and algorithms that optimize an online performance measure. In particular, you will learn about how to design and analyze algorithms that can work under minimal assumptions about the environment.
